themes: insufficient funding for arts and culture
difficulty discovering cultural events in a fragmented media environment
overreliance on cars and parking issues
urban sprawl and lack of walkability
key_phrases: fragmented media environment, how to discover what's out there?
our shitty public transportation infrastructure is also an issue
our cars are the only viable way of getting somewhere
precious real estate is cannibalized by parking lots
we need walkability, accessibility and viable alternatives to driving
Art needs proximity. Art needs visibility
we need to rethink our city for human-centered design
barriers_identified: lack of funding for arts and culture
overwhelming and fragmented information about events
dependence on cars due to lack of alternatives
parking taking up valuable real estate
solutions_proposed: rethink city design for human-centered urban planning
